entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:32 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:32 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
